subproject.description: All three windows of the Peace and Reintegration Trust Fund (P&RTF) are successfully managed. This project's oversight is undertaken through an independent monitoring agent.
subproject.title: P&RTF Management Support

subproject.description: Effective field and technical support Afghanistan Peace and Reintegration Project Joint for sustainable reintegration and peace building. The aim is to provide technical assistance appropriately and effectively.
subproject.title: APRP Field Support

subproject.description: Contributions made to sustainable peace and reintegration in target provinces through the implementation of community recovery projects. This include, to support Ministry of Rural Rehabilitation and Development financially and in line with the project's objectives.
subproject.title: National Recovery Programmes

subproject.description: Effective management of Afghanistan Peace and Reintegration Project delivery ensured through UNDP technical and operational support. APRP Joint Secretariat efficiently leads and coordinates the implementation of APRP activities at the center and provincial levels.
subproject.title: Management and Coordination
